data.title: Veda Howard, Author at MyPraise 102.5, Atlanta, Inspiration, Gospel, Radio, WPZE
data.meta_description:
MyPraise 102.5, Atlanta, Inspiration, Gospel, Radio, WPZE's Page 4 of 20 - Veda Howard, Author at MyPraise 102.5, Atlanta, Inspiration, Gospel, Radio, WPZEMyPraise 102.5, Atlanta, Inspiration, Gospel, Radio, WPZE: Veda Howard is a comedian, actress, radio personality and keynote speaker. Since stepping to the microphone, she has performed at comedy clubs, festivals, the One Love Gospel Cruise, the national Family Comedy Tour and numerous other events. 

She has conducted red carpet interviews for TV One and is a recurring guest on FOX 5’s Good Day Atlanta, sharing her Wisdom Nuggets. 

Veda can currently be heard on Atlanta’s Inspiration Station, Praise 102.5 on Saturdays and Sundays from 3pm-7pm and is syndicated on the weekends on Urban One, Inc. Inspiration Stations in Cleveland, Columbus, Houston, Philadelphia, Raleigh and Richmond.

In addition to her love of laughter, Veda Howard is also an actor. She has been seen in numerous national television advertising campaigns for brands such as Invesco QQQ, Grammarly, Gorilla Glue and Home Depot. As a voice actor, she has been heard on national commercials for Oxi Clean, Google, Amazon, Johnnie Walker, Crunch Fitness and other well-known brands. 

Veda is a recurring promo voice for Sundance TV’s True Crime Story series and has voiced promos for ESPN and New York Times best selling author, James Patterson. 

She has worked in the music industry for over 20 years and has enjoyed producing events nationally and internationally featuring such artists as Stevie Wonder, Natalie Cole, Brian McKnight, Yolanda Adams, Jimmy Jam & Terry Lewis, The O’Jays, Take 6, Shirley Caesar, Usher and numerous others.

Raised in southern New Jersey, Veda Howard is a graduate of Hampton University and currently resides in Atlanta, Georgia.

"Never lose your laughter!" - Veda Howard

www.VedaHoward.com

data.text:
Veda Howard is a comedian, actress, radio personality and keynote speaker. Since stepping to the microphone, she has performed at comedy clubs, festivals, the One Love Gospel Cruise, the national Family Comedy Tour and numerous other events.

She has conducted red carpet interviews for TV One and is a recurring guest on FOX 5’s Good Day Atlanta, sharing her Wisdom Nuggets.

Veda can currently be heard on Atlanta’s Inspiration Station, Praise 102.5 on Saturdays and Sundays from 3pm-7pm and is syndicated on the weekends on Urban One, Inc. Inspiration Stations in Cleveland, Columbus, Houston, Philadelphia, Raleigh and Richmond.

In addition to her love of laughter, Veda Howard is also an actor. She has been seen in numerous national television advertising campaigns for brands such as Invesco QQQ, Grammarly, Gorilla Glue and Home Depot. As a voice actor, she has been heard on national commercials for Oxi Clean, Google, Amazon, Johnnie Walker, Crunch Fitness and other well-known brands.

Veda is a recurring promo voice for Sundance TV’s True Crime Story series and has voiced promos for ESPN and New York Times best selling author, James Patterson.

She has worked in the music industry for over 20 years and has enjoyed producing events nationally and internationally featuring such artists as Stevie Wonder, Natalie Cole, Brian McKnight, Yolanda Adams, Jimmy Jam & Terry Lewis, The O’Jays, Take 6, Shirley Caesar, Usher and numerous others.

Raised in southern New Jersey, Veda Howard is a graduate of Hampton University and currently resides in Atlanta, Georgia.

"Never lose your laughter!" - Veda Howard

www.VedaHoward.com
